product_name: The North Face Glacier Triclimate Jacket - Women's
long_description: The North Face Glacier Triclimate is a 3-in-1 winter jacket that lets you wear a waterproof, breathable shell and fleece liner, together or separately, for the ultimate in wintertime flexibility. Polyester HyVent(R) shell is seam sealed and has an attached, adjustable hood, zippered hand pockets and a hem cinch-cord. Removable polyester 100-weight fleece liner has two zippered hand pockets and a brushed collar for comfort. Wear The North Face Glacier Triclimate shell by itself on mild, wet days; the liner by itself on cool, dry days; and both together on cold, wet days. Jacket features zip-in compatibility with complementary garments from The North Face.
short_description: The North Face Glacier Triclimate is a 3-in-1 winter jacket that lets you wear a waterproof, breathable shell and fleece liner, together or separately, for the ultimate in wintertime flexibility.
